topics.body:
A bit of a thing about Devil fruits.

There can only be one user of a particular devil fruit power at a time. (Another fruit of that type won't grow until the current user of that power dies.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55504a4e63687204eac10500#post_55504a4e63687204eac10500
Aura is essentially your life force. It's based in the soul. And those who can see aura have natural empathitic abilities. Ki is based on the body. It doesn't draw on anything but your strength and your natural pool of ki.
